Troy.Alfred H. Renshaw House:
The Alfred H. Renshaw House is a historic house located at 33 Fiddlers Lane in Colonie, Albany County, New York.


== Description and history ==
It was built in 1926-1927 and is a brick mansion in the Tudor Revival style. It features three tall chimneys with paired flues, a slate roof with multiple gables, and a Tudor arch around the main entrance.
